name: hague
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the government capital of the Netherlands, in the western part of the country: The tribunal was held in The Hague. Normally, however, the Parliament sits in The Hague, the city which has historically been the seat of the Dutch government, the Dutch monarchy, and the Dutch supreme court. They were in the Hague to share their research with the International Criminal Court.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in The Hague the following morning.When not on temporary loan, the painting hangs at Mauritshuis museum in The Hague.I went off to The Hague and studied there for a couple of years.
